titles.title: A concurrent resolution to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the heroic rescue of Danish Jews during World War II by the Danish people.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16231-16232)
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Commemorates the bravery and valor of those Danes who participated in rescue operations that saved the lives of 7,300 Danish Jews in 1943.
